Package general

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Represents a square board with BoardSquares of alternating colors.
    Piece
    Represents a generic piece in a board game such as Chess or Checkers.
    Player
    Represents a player, who can make moves on a Board.
    SoundPlayer
    Contains static methods for playing a sound synchronously or asynchronously.
    TerminalPlayer
    Represents a human player playing the game through a terminal.
    TurnSystem
    Manages whose turn it is for any number of Players.
    Utils
    Holds static methods which are used in multiple places.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Side
    Represents a side of a Board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameOverException
    Thrown when the game ends to exit the loop.
